sense.name: Confirm the validity of, as of a legal proceeding, scientific experiment, or idea; possibly only perceptually rather than officially.
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] VALIDATE NP2[patient[abstract]] Note: The thing validated must be ABSTRACT.
sense.examples: The economic downturn validated all of Sir Alan's predictions. His evidence helps to validate my theory. A judge helped to validate the process.

sense.name: Validate a document for the purpose of executing a process or receiving compensation.
sense.commentary: Syntax Is: NP1[agent] VALIDATE NP2[patient[concrete]] Note: The thing validated must be CONCRETE.
sense.examples: The movie theater validted my parking stub so I didn't have to pay. My supervisor validated my timesheet. I have to validate these invoices by the end of the day.
